00131             function                public_review_list( $Options )
00132             {
00133                   try
00134                   {
00135                         $MasterId = $this->Security->get_gp( 'master_id' , 'integer' );
00136                         $MasterType = $Options->get_setting( 'master_type' , 'command' );
00137                         
00138                         $this->Output  = '';
00139                         $this->Output .= "{review_line:master_id=$MasterId;master_type=$MasterType}";
00140                         $this->Output .= "{permit:registered}{review_form:master_id=$MasterId;".
